    • Constructor Detail

      • StateChangeOld

        public StateChangeOld(double rdm,
                      double[] probabilities)
        When calling the constructor a state change is performed, using the given data. The probabilities of changing into different states must add up to 1.
        Parameters:
        _rdm - - A random double value.
        _probabilities - - Array of probability values (double) for changing into the next state.

    • Method Detail

      • checkStateProbabilities

        private void checkStateProbabilities(double[] probabilities)
        Checks whether the sum of the values within the probability array adds up to 1.
        Parameters:
        the - probability array

      • doStateTransition

        private int doStateTransition()
        The next occupancy value is calculated using the current probabilities.

        Returns the current occupancy value.
